li.label: Petal Strike
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} strikes with the grace of a falling petal, each attack blooming into a deadly dance. {PAWN_pronoun}'s blade moves with fluid elegance, overwhelming foes with nature's beauty and lethality.

li.label: Fluttering Steps
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} glides across the battlefield like a petal on the wind, evading attacks with effortless poise. {PAWN_pronoun} moves with ethereal swiftness, striking before enemies can react.

li.label: Nature's Whisper
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} exudes an aura of tranquility, harmonizing with the natural world. Animals feel drawn to {PAWN_possessive} presence, recognizing the gentle strength that flows through {PAWN_pronoun} like a quiet breeze.

li.label: Blossom's Resilience
li.description: Like a flower weathering the storm, {PAWN_nameDef} endures hardship with unyielding grace. Even when battered by adversity, {PAWN_pronoun} stands tall, unwavering in determination.

li.label: Floral Fortitude
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} flourishes even in the harshest conditions, immune to the toxins that wilt lesser beings. Like a lotus rising from the mud, {PAWN_pronoun} remains pure and unshaken.

li.label: Botanical Cuisine
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} understands the delicate balance of nature, crafting meals infused with the nourishing essence of flowers. With {PAWN_possessive} skills, no ingredient is wasted, and every dish is a masterpiece.

li.label: Floral Magnetism
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} possesses an enchanting presence, drawing others in like bees to a blossoming flower. {PAWN_pronoun}'s very spirit inspires devotion and admiration.

li.label: Petal's Healing Touch
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} mends wounds with the tender touch of a blossoming flower, easing pain with natural grace. {PAWN_pronoun} embodies both beauty and restoration, ensuring none wither under {PAWN_possessive} care.

li.label: Floral Abundance
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} nurtures the land with every step, leaving lush growth in {PAWN_possessive} wake. From decay, new life flourishes, ensuring that nature always finds a way to bloom again.
